title: Systems Developer I
summary: Application support and development for a county tax office; reporting, interfaces, and data quality work.
responsibilities: Maintained a closed-source client-server tax-office application (VB6 WinForms, T-SQL, MS-Access reports), including report generation for tens of thousands of heterogeneous tax bills.
Built integrations with the existing system via SQL Server triggers, scheduled tasks, and stored procedures.

Developed a large integrated tax billing application to supplement the county COTS system using MS Access, XML, SQL Server, and custom unit tests; covered full SDLC from requirements through deployment and training.
Created numerous import/export interfaces using T-SQL procedures, DTS, MS-Access, and other custom packages to integrate with external organizations (banks and government agencies).
Improved data quality by building MS-Access cross-tabs to identify errors in a Visual FoxPro system.
